name: MEC Core Train Short Sleeve T-Shirt - Men's
description:
Train harder to go farther. Our Core program features an incredibly airy, breathable fabric that lets you push yourself without overheating. Smooth seams are intentionally placed where they won't distract or chafe. The odour minimizing treatment allows daily sweat sessions without daily laundry.Super lightweight polyester wicks moisture and dries quickly.Fabric has a subtle marled appearance and a soft feel.Polygiene antimicrobial treatment resists odour build-up.Low-profile merrow seams sit forward on body for distraction-free activity.

Slim fit



Fit guide

Garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering


All MEC men’s and boy’s pants are regular rise.




        Sustainability
